name: Rotten Apple - Alpha
description:
Rotten Apple aka Angelyne has to find way home by touching the tombstone.
You can use the GUI or using your keyboard to control Rotten Apple.

Controls :
ASWD or Arrow keys to move
Top Right Corner is the function key, from left to right are home button, reset level button, save button and load button.
Tips :
Save before making any tough moves it will make the game a lot easier.
Get stuck ? Just restart the level.

This is a birthday project, an alpha stage game. I would like to update the game in the future.

Rotten Apple aka Angelyne is a property of the respective owner
